item.description:
Cookout, bring a dish to share. Fireworks start at 9pm. BYOB please and bring own cooler, warm jacket or sweat shirt in case it get cooler in evening .Bring a Bathing suit and towel if you want to go for swim at Oakland Beach. Bring lawn chair. Bring a smile and plan on having a good time.  Happy 4th to all.

 

I recommend taking a dry run to find my house.  This way you will not get lost the day of the picnic. If you have a problem finding a parking spot, stop and see me.  My neighbor in the back of me will let me park many cars in her yard and my neighbor on the side of me.

Only park on the right side of street.  Look for beach ball on the pole at the beginning  of my street where signs reads Dead End.
item.how_to_find_us: Address is 24 Crockett Street, Warwick, RI

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Cookout (pot luck) Oakland beach Mary K. House
